FlowDefinition.description: *** Used the OOTB Screenflow MLP Form Factor *** This screen flow is used to drive the custom functionality for managing the dependency between the 4 Picklists on the Lead object, namely Sector (Single Picklist), Solution (Single Picklist), Expertise (Multi Picklist), and Sub Expertise (Multi Picklist).
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Lead | New Client - Manage Sector, Solution, Expertise and Sub-Expertise (OLD)
